hero.description: My name is Yannick Kobe Mbaikwo, Full Stack developer specialized in creating intelligent web solutions using Laravel / React / VueJs / NextJS / Wordpress since 2015.

technologie.details: I've worked with a range a technologies in the web development world. From back-end To Design
